org.apache.shiro.web.faces.tags

Class GuestTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.faces.view.facelets.TagHandler
      • org.apache.shiro.web.faces.tags.SecureTagHandler
        • org.apache.shiro.web.faces.tags.AuthenticationTagHandler
          • org.apache.shiro.web.faces.tags.GuestTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.faces.view.facelets.FaceletHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UserTag

    public class GuestTag
extends AuthenticationTagHandler
    Tag that renders the tag body if the current user is not known to the system, either because they haven't logged in yet, or because they have no 'RememberMe' identity.

    The logically opposite tag of this one is the UserTag. Please read that class's JavaDoc as it explains more about the differences between Authenticated/Unauthenticated and User/Guest semantic differences.

    Author:
    Deluan Quintao, Les Hazlewood
